alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 12:21AM CDT until June 24 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Thomas County in north central Nebraska... Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1220 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Littleburg to 6 miles east of Valentine National Wildlife Refuge to 7 miles north of Seneca, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Valentine, Ainsworth, Springview, Long Pine, Johnstown, Purdum, Brownlee, Norden, Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Elsmere, Wood Lake, Burton, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Marsh Flat, Smith Falls State Park and Koshopah. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 194 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 193 and 252. Highway 83 between mile markers 155 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 69. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas
